dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryTargetDS02
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryTargetDS02

sources.name: Source_DS_02
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source_DS_02
